alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:26PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Madison and northwestern Beaverhead Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 624 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking numerous strong thunderstorms over northwestern Beaverhead County and northwestern Madison County. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Sheridan, Twin Bridges, Wisdom, Silver Star, Jackson, Melrose, Wise River, Polaris, Dewey, Laurin and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
